snippet.title: Sonic Adventure 2: SRB2 Edition - Sonic Robo Blast 2 Mod Showcase
snippet.description:
I should really get back to SRB2. If you liked this I can cover the rest of the OLDC 2021 Round 2 levels.

Mods used:
- Adventure Sonic by Metalwario64
https://mb.srb2.org/addons/adventure-sonic-v1-2.3589/
- Adventure HUD by TehRealSalt
https://mb.srb2.org/threads/sonic-adventure-style-hud.27294/
- Adventure Monitors by Demnyx Onyxfur
https://mb.srb2.org/threads/adventure-monitors-for-2-2.27615/
- Adventure Styled Explosions by Golden Shine
https://mb.srb2.org/addons/adventure-styled-explosions.3571/

Levels used:
- Follow Your Rainbow by Rogerregorroger: https://mb.srb2.org/addons/official-level-design-contest-2021-round-2.3579/
- Lofty Woods by Vixuzen: https://mb.srb2.org/addons/official-level-design-contest-2021-round-2.3579/
- Wave Ocean and Crisis City by Micheal Blur: https://mb.srb2.org/threads/sonic-2006-extended-port.30027/

0:00 - Follow Your Rainbow
3:14 - Lofty Woods
6:29 - Wave Ocean
8:53 - Crisis City



My Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/nGCwf7256Y
_____________________________________________________________________________
